8 karththarudaiya yaagaththin naaLilE naan adhipadhigaLaiyum raajakumaararaiyum maRudhEsaththu vaSthiram tharikkiRa yaavaraiyum dhaNdippEn.
9 vaasaRpadiyaith thaaNdi, kodumaiyinaalum vanjagaththinaalum thangaL ejamaangaLin veedugaLai nirappugiRa yaavaraiyum annaaLilE dhaNdippEn.
10 annaaLilE meenvaasalilirundhu kookkuralin saththamum, nagaraththin iraNdaam paagaththilirundhu alaRudhalum, mEdugaLilirundhu magaa sangaaraththin iraichchalum uNdaagumendru karththar sollugiRaar.
11 makdhEshin kudigaLE alaRungaL; varththagarellaarum sangaaramaanaargaL; kaasukkaarar yaavarum vettuNdupOnaargaL.

12 akkaalaththilE naan erusalEmai viLakkukkoLuththi sOdhiththu vaNdalpOlak kuzhambiyirukkiRavargaLum, karththar nanmaiseyvadhum illai theemaiseyvadhum illaiyendru thangaL irudhayaththil sollugiRavargaLumaana manusharai dhaNdippEn.

13 avargaLudaiya aaSthi koLLaiyaagum; avargaLudaiya veedugaL paazhaaippOgum; avargaL veedugaLaikkattiyum, avaigaLil kudiyirukkamaattaargaL; avargaL dhraatchaththOttangaLai naattiyum, avaigaLin pazharasaththaik kudippadhillai.

14 karththarudaiya periyanaaL sameebiththirukkiRadhu; adhu kittichchErndhu migavum theeviriththu varugiRadhu; karththarudaiya naaL engiRa saththaththukkup paraakkiramasaali mudhalaai angE manankasandhu alaRuvaan.
15 andha naaL ukkiraththin naaL; adhu ikkattum idukkamumaana naaL; adhu azhivum paazhkkadippumaana naaL; adhu iruLum andhagaaramumaana naaL; adhu mappum mandhaaramumaana naaL.
16 adhu araNippaana nagarangaLukkum, uyaramaana koththaLangaLukkum virOdhamaaga ekkaaLam oodhugiRadhum aarpparikkiRadhumaana naaL.

17 manushar karththarukku virOdhamaaip paavancheydhapadiyaal, avargaL kurudaraippOla nadakkumpadi naan avargaLai varuththappaduththuvEn; avargaL raththam puzhudhiyaippOl soriyappadum; avargaL maamsam eruvaippOl kidakkum.

18 karththarudaiya ukkiraththin naaLilE avargaL veLLiyum avargaL ponnum avargaLaith thappuvikkamaattaadhu; avarudaiya erichchalin akkiniyinaal dhEsamellaam azhiyum, dhEsaththin kudigaLaiyellaam sadidhiyaai nirmoolampaNNuvaar.
